#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

long long int T, N, K, Memo[2000][2000];

long long int Count ( long long int N, long long int K )
{
    if ( N < K ) return 0LL;

    if ( ! N ) return 1LL;
    if ( ! K ) return 1LL;

    if ( Memo[N][K] ) return Memo[N][K];

    return Memo[N][K] = Count ( N - 1, K - 1 ) + Count ( N - 1, K );
}

int main ( void )
{
    cin >> T;

    while ( T-- )
    {
        cin >> N >> K;

        long long int Sol = Count ( N, K );

        double Log10 = log10 ( Sol );
        double Log2 = Log10 / log10 ( 2 );

        long long int intLog10 = floor ( Log10 );
        long long int intLog2 = floor ( Log2 );

        intLog10++;
        intLog2++;

        cout << intLog10 << " " << intLog2 << endl;
    }

    return 0;
}
